sn12.37:1.3: Purāṇamidaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ vedaniyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn12.37:2.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti:
sn12.37:2.2: ‘iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati;
sn12.37:2.3: imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati, yadidaṃ—
